text: Amin Salman Mosque is a mosque in Djibouti City, Djibouti. ==Capacity== Salman Mosque has the capacity to accommodate up to 1,500 worshippers. ==See also== * Religion in Djibouti * List of mosques in Africa * Islam in Djibouti ==References== Category:Mosques in Djibouti Category:Abbasid architecture Category:Buildings and structures in Djibouti City
title: Salman Mosque
